languages.text: "Куда Наместник смотрит! Бить их надо! Ну ничего — мы и сами... как-нибудь разберемся!"
"How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"
languages.original_text: "Куда Наместник смотрит! Бить их надо! Ну ничего — мы и сами... как-нибудь разберемся!"

traits.locale_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"
"How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"
"How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"
"How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"
"How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

languages.text: “总督怎么能忍受这种情况？他应该对那群人处以石刑！好吧，看来……我们只能自己解决这个问题了！”
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: “总督怎么能忍受这种情况？他应该对那群人处以石刑！好吧，看来……我们只能自己解决这个问题了！”

languages.text: «¿Cómo puede aguantar esto nuestro señor? ¡Habría que lapidarlos a todos! En fin... ¡nos ocuparemos nosotros mismos!».
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo puede aguantar esto nuestro señor? ¡Habría que lapidarlos a todos! En fin... ¡nos ocuparemos nosotros mismos!».

languages.text: 「領主はなぜこんなことをしたんだ？全員石打ちにすればよかったのに！仕方ない…俺たちの力で始末するぞ！」
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: 「領主はなぜこんなことをしたんだ？全員石打ちにすればよかったのに！仕方ない…俺たちの力で始末するぞ！」

languages.text: "Wie kann der Lehnsherr das zulassen? Sie hätten alle gesteinigt werden müssen! Na schön ... dann erledigen wir das eben selbst!"
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie kann der Lehnsherr das zulassen? Sie hätten alle gesteinigt werden müssen! Na schön ... dann erledigen wir das eben selbst!"

languages.text: « Comment le suzerain peut tolérer ça ? Ils auraient dû tous être lapidés ! Bon, très bien... On va s'en charger nous-mêmes ! »
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment le suzerain peut tolérer ça ? Ils auraient dû tous être lapidés ! Bon, très bien... On va s'en charger nous-mêmes ! »

languages.text: "Emîr buna nasıl müsaade etmiş? Hepsini taşlamaları gerekirdi! Biz de kendi işimizi kendimiz görürüz!"
languages.original_text: "How can the Liege stand for this? They should've stoned them all! Fine, then... we'll deal with this ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: "Emîr buna nasıl müsaade etmiş? Hepsini taşlamaları gerekirdi! Pekâlâ... İşi kendimiz bitirelim öyleyse!"
